name: RAPICCA 932°F Heat Resistant BBQ Grill Gloves: Oil Resistant Waterproof for Smoking Grilling Cooking Barbecue Deep Frying Turkey Rotisserie Handling Hot Greasy Meat | Great Stocking Stuffers for Men
short_description: Excellent Oil & Heat Resistance: Crafted from Food-Grade neoprene rubber, these gloves boast outstanding resistance to water, oil, stains and heat up to 932℉. With a 14-inch sleeve, they provide comprehensive protection for both your arms and hands as you perfect your BBQ masterpiece, handle hot meat on your smoker or grill, or undertake tasks like rotisserie chicken or deep-frying turkey.

Comfortable Firm Grip: Designed for pit masters, this glove features a double-layer insulated liner and a textured palm, ensuring a comfortable and firm grip. Effortlessly manage hot, wet, or greasy meat in your smoker, BBQ, or fryer—ideal for mastering pulled pork like the pros!This glove model is One Size Fits Most (approximately Size 10 / XL), designed to fit most adult hands.

Smooth Hot Liquid & STEAM Management: Experience effortless food extraction from hot boiling water or steam with these gloves, ensuring secure and easy handling. The waterproof neoprene coating offers a reliable grip, enhancing convenience in various cooking tasks, like dipping a chicken in hot water (Please conduct a cold water test to check for potential defective gloves).

Effortless Cleaning Experience: The flexible waterproof neoprene coating on these gloves resists heat, grease, oil, water, and even chemical liquids. Simply wear the gloves, wash them with a little soap, and hang them to air dry for an optimal, stain-free, oil-free experience!

Great Gift for Outdoor Cooking & Heat Tasks:A practical essential for grilling, smoking, deep-frying turkey, rotisserie prep, fire-pit tending, wood-stove handling, camping, and fireplace work. An excellent choice for Stocking Stuffers for Men and Christmas Gifts for Men—a useful, year-round gift they’ll truly appreciate.

name: BBQ Fireproof Gloves, Grill Cut-Resistant 1472°F Heat Resistant Gloves, Non-Slip Silicone Oven Gloves, Kitchen Safe Cooking Gloves for Oven Mitts,Barbecue,Cooking, Frying,13.8 Inch-Red
short_description: 【High Quality Three-Layer Material】: This heat-resistant BBQ glove is composed of three materials. The first layer of silicone provides anti slip grip strength, ensuring that items in your hands are not easily slipped off. The second layer is made of ultra-high strength aramid fiber, known for its high temperature resistance and resistance to repeated use. The innermost layer adopts a knitted design, enhancing the comfort and breathability of the gloves, so you don't have to worry about the sticky feeling caused by sweat. When using silicone or cloth insulated gloves to remove hot food from the oven, which can easily burn your wrist. Choose our heat-resistant gloves to solve your problem.

【Enhanced Heat Resistance】Although our grilling gloves have excellent heat resistance, it should be noted that all heat-resistant materials have their limits. Our heat resistant gloves can hold for 10 seconds when the temperature reaches 800 degrees Celsius (1472 degrees Fahrenheit). Generally speaking, the higher the temperature of an object, the shorter the holding time. For example, you can safely hold a hot metal baking tray taken out of a 200 degree Fahrenheit oven for longer than holding a hot metal pizza tray taken out of a 500 degree Fahrenheit oven. But for your safety, please avoid direct contact with open flames and avoid prolonged exposure to high temperatures to prevent burns.

【Don't Exceed 10 Seconds】You can use barbecue gloves to handle cast iron pots, adjust charcoal fires, and even move hot grills. Your hands never feel hot (please note, do not exceed 10 seconds, and a brief grip will not feel hot). Our oven gloves provide excellent protection for your wrists when used in the kitchen with ovens, microwave ovens, slow stew pots, frying pans, barbecue grills, or near fireplaces, smoking ovens, or outdo or fire pits.

【Easy to Wear, Clean and Store】：The two cooking gloves are identical and can be worn interchangeably. The oven mitts fit comfortably, move freely, and have flexible fingers, allowing you to easily grip clips or other kitchen utensils. The grill gloves length is also sufficient to protect your wrist and forearm, which are areas that many other gloves cannot cover. This barbecue glove is easy to put on and take off, slightly elastic, and can adapt to various hand shapes. The BBQ gloves are equipped with an additional hanging rope design for easy hanging and drying after washing. Grilling gloves can be hand washed or machine washed. Basically suitable for everyone.

【Friendly Reminder】Although our barbecue gloves have excellent heat resistance and flame retardancy, which can prolong the time you hold high-temperature objects, please note that all heat-resistant materials have their limitations. BBQ gloves don't provide permanent fire and insulation protection. Please avoid prolonged direct contact with open flames and high temperatures during use to prevent burns. These gloves are very useful and will become a regular part of your outdoor barbecue tools and accessories. I have confidence in the quality of our products. We offer a one-year warranty period. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us and we will solve them within 12 hours!
